name: 2024 8th International Conference on Software and e-Business (ICSeB 2024)
content: Publication: Full papers after proper registration and presentation will be peer-reviewed, and the accepted papers will be published by ACM in the ICSeB 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be included in the ACM Digital Library and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus.
organizers: Kindai Universit, Japan and Southern University of Science and Technology, China
